title: Gallic War 6.17 - Gods of the Gauls 4

content.question: According to Roman belief, Apollo is a god of many things other than healing. Name one and only one of these things.

frqParts.text: According to Roman belief, Apollo is a god of many things other than healing. Name one and only one of these things.

skill.text: 2.B: Describe historical and cultural contexts of Latin texts.
